entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 a.m. EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
